mapper.select: select count(*) from ( select h.houseId from t_house h left join t_area a on h.houseQuYuId = a.id left join t_subway s on h.houseDiTieId = s.subwayId left join house_age hage on h.houseAgeId = hage.houseAgeId left join house_direction hdir on h.houseDirectionId = hdir.houseDirectionId left join house_floor hfl on h.houseFloorTypeId = hfl.houseFloorTypeId left join house_type hty on h.houseTypeId = hty.houseTypeId left join house_use hus on h.houseUseId = hus.houseUseId left join house_zutype hzu on h.ZuTypeid = hzu.ZuTypeid left join house_feature hfe on h.houseTeSeId = hfe.houseTeSeId left join house_man hman on h.houseManId = hman.id left join t_agent tage on h.agentId = tage.agentId ) a

select h.*,a.name houseQuYuName,s.subwayName houseDiTieName,hage.ageName houseAgeName, hdir.otName houseDirectionName,hfl.floorName houseFloorTypeName, hty.houseName houseTypeName,hus.useName houseUseName,hzu.ZuTypeName houseZuTypeName, hfe.houseTeSeName TeSeName, hman.name houseManName, tage.agentName agentName from t_house h left join t_area a on h.houseQuYuId = a.id left join t_subway s on h.houseDiTieId = s.subwayId left join house_age hage on h.houseAgeId = hage.houseAgeId left join house_direction hdir on h.houseDirectionId = hdir.houseDirectionId left join house_floor hfl on h.houseFloorTypeId = hfl.houseFloorTypeId left join house_type hty on h.houseTypeId = hty.houseTypeId left join house_use hus on h.houseUseId = hus.houseUseId left join house_zutype hzu on h.ZuTypeid = hzu.ZuTypeid left join house_feature hfe on h.houseTeSeId = hfe.houseTeSeId left join house_man hman on h.houseManId = hman.id left join t_agent tage on h.agentId = tage.agentId
limit #{start},#{rows}
select * from t_area a where a.pid=#{pid}
select * from t_subway s where s.subwayPid=#{pid}
mapper.delete: delete from t_house where houseId in (${ids})
mapper.update: update t_exhibition e set e.volume=e.volume+1 where e.agentId=#{agentId}
update t_exhibition e set e.daiKanliang=e.daiKanliang+1 where e.agentId=#{agentId}
